description: For 16 years, Larry Norris served as director of the Arkansas Department of Correction before retiring at the beginning of 2010. Now, at 65, Norris will return to the prison system as interim director when Director Ray Hobbs retires Oct. 31.
title: Prison board names Norris interim chief
title_page: Prison board names Norris interim chief
text:
Arkansas Democrat-Gazette/STATON BREIDENTHAL 9/8/09 Arkansas Department of Corrections Director Larry Norris. - Photo by Staton Breidenthal
For 16 years, Larry Norris served as director of the Arkansas Department of Correction before retiring at the beginning of 2010. Now, at 65, Norris will return to the prison system as interim director when Director Ray Hobbs retires Oct. 31.
